decoder.name: ssh-invfailed
decoder.prematch: ^Failed \S+ for invalid user|^Failed \S+ for illegal user

decoder.name: sudo
decoder.ftscomment: First time user executed the sudo command

decoder.name: netscreenfw-traffic
decoder.order: protocol, action, srcip, dstip, srcport, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw1
decoder.order: id, protocol, action, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw2
decoder.order: id, protocol, action, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw3
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw5
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw6
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw7
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: pix-fw8
decoder.order: id, action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: windows-firewall
decoder.order: action, protocol, srcip, dstip, srcport, dstport

decoder.name: cisco-ios-acl
decoder.order: action, protocol, srcip, srcport, dstip, dstport

decoder.name: cisco-ios-ids
decoder.ftscomment: First time Cisco IOS IDS/IPS module rule fired.

decoder.name: auditd-selinux
decoder.regex: ^(AVC) msg=audit\(\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d.\d\d\d:(\d+)\): avc: (\S+) { \.+ } for pid=\d+ comm="(\S+)" path="\S+" dev=\S+ ino=\d+ scontext=\S+ tcontext=\S+ tclass=\S+$

decoder.name: auditd-syscall
decoder.regex: ^(SYSCALL) msg=audit\(\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d.\d\d\d:(\d+)\): arch=\w+ syscall=\d+ success=(\S+) exit=\S+ a0=\w+ a1=\w+ a2=\w+ a3=\w+ items=\d+ ppid=\d+ pid=\d+ auid=\d+ uid=\d+ gid=\d+ euid=\d+ suid=\d+ fsuid=\d+ egid=\d+ sgid=\d+ fsgid=\d+ tty=\S+ ses=\d+ comm="\S+" exe="(\.+)"

decoder.name: auditd-config
decoder.regex: ^(CONFIG_CHANGE) msg=audit\(\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d.\d\d\d:(\d+)\): auid=\d+ ses=\d+ op="\.+" path="(\.+)" key="\S+" list=\d+ res=\d+$

decoder.name: auditd-path
decoder.regex: ^(PATH) msg=audit\(\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d\d.\d\d\d:(\d+)\): item=\d+ name="(\.+)" inode=\d+ dev=\S+ mode=\d+ ouid=\d+ ogid=\d+ rdev=\S+

decoder.name: auditd-user
decoder.regex: ses=\d+ subj=\S+ msg='\.+ acct="(\.+)" exe="(\.+)" hostname=\S+ addr=(\S+) terminal=\S+ res=(\S+)$

decoder.name: auditd-user
decoder.regex: subj=\S+ msg='\.+ acct="(\.+)" \p*\s*exe="(\.+)" \(hostname=\S+, addr=(\S+), terminal=\S+ res=(\S+)\)'$

decoder.name: auditd-user
decoder.regex: subj=\S+ msg='\.+ exe="(\.+)" \(hostname=\S+, addr=(\S+), terminal=\S+ res=(\S+)\)'$
